supercars.title: Supercars
supercars.description: A supercar (also referred to as an exotic) is a luxury, high-performance sports car or grand tourer.[1][2] The term is used in marketing by automakers for unusual and expensive vehicles, and has been used to refer to different sorts of cars

classiccars.title: Classic Cars
classiccars.description: According to Muscle Cars, a book written by Peter Henshaw, a "muscle car" is "a product of the American car industry adhering to the hot rodder's philosophy of taking a small car and putting a large-displacement engine in it.
